新段位机制就是TM傻逼机制，想出来这东西的人真的是弱智。我1300小时的玩家，每个月都至少上4，就是为了下个赛季起码还是紫段。你看看日服这群弱智日本人，红段紫段还能算会玩的正常人，绿段就已经是弱智了，再下面的根本就不能算是人。现在每个月直接段位重置回最低，匹的这队友真的看的人脑淤血。我1300小时，从黎明杀机刚出就开始玩了，现在是真的不想玩这个游戏了。

As of right now i don't recommend this game to anyone as all the game does is crash no matter what you try, I've uninstalled and reinstalled twice still crashes. verified the files like 6 times, done all the "run as admin" things. no matter what this game just constantly crashes. most of the time i cant even watch 3 seconds of the opening cut scene without it crashing.

EDIT: this game apparently doesnt support MSI afterburner and is the reason i kept crashing super annoying to figure out without any sort of crash report

after fixing the issue above i played this game more. i generally play this game solo and well playing killer is probably the best for solo however this game is only really fun if you are playing as the survivor with your friends because if you play the killer get ready for some of the most stressful game play and the most toxic community ive seen. survivors have some bullshit perks as well as killer but the problem with either of these is that when survivors bring these bullshit perks its 4 of these perks to the killers 1 perk. for a game that was supposed to be a horror game it really only fits that horror game feel when you are brand new to the game and play the survivor role. because after that you learn that you have perks and can in some cases on some maps basically outrun the killer making this game more of a joke in the "horror" aspect.

Mrok wieczorny — babcia siwa
przy kominku głową kiwa.
Nos jak haczyk, okulary,
Coś pierdoli babsztyl stary.
Snuje bajdy niestworzone,
O królewnie Pizdolonie,
O trzech braciach jak niewielu,
O matuli ich z burdelu,
Opowiada stare dzieje…
A na dworze wicher wieje.

Aleksander Fredro

Прощай дбд 2016-2021.

Death to toxic players

I didn't think I would be so into this horror game, speaking I was unable to play games such as Dead Space or Amnesia without pure anxiety, but this one is different. While I can say I have jumped in horror as Victor jumps on my back, I've always had fun. There needs to be some work done for server stability, as it shows I have excellent ping and FPS before entering a match, but during a chase myself and others are lagging and rubber banding which can make surviving, or killing, more difficult. Sometimes, the MMR, is a little weird, I've been paired with anything from bottom rank (which, I'm currently rank 19) to higher-mid rank Survivors or Killers (6-14) and wondering why I'm getting immediately slaughtered or why the match seemed easier than normal. Overall, would recommend and have been bugging friends to pick it up and join me in the new quest, as it is definitely more fun with friends. Lets see what they do next.

I've been playing this for about 8 months and am indefinitely uninstalling the game. While frustration is a part of games with PVP, the enjoyable moments usually outweigh the bad. That's what what keeps a lot of people coming back to play, even if they had a few bad matches one day.

In short, ever since this last patch, I've had almost exclusively bad games. This isn't about losing matches. It's about the game simply not being fun to play anymore. And the players are just as much at fault as the devs.

Surely part of the blame rests on the developers. Out of all the recent changes, making the server desyncs worse than before have made playing survivor tilting, even when you consciously accept and tell yourself "This game is flawed, so just have fun and don't take it seriously!" While I actively stay out of the drama obsessing over patch notes and blaming the devs for every wrong move, the new desync alone is enough to ruin the fun for 4 of the 5 people in every game.

However, it's not only the desync that is forcing me to stop playing. The recent wave of killer players who returned after the patch have made this game extremely toxic and not fun. Before the patch, the tryhard toxic killer wasn't so prevalent and people could usually have fun with the game without running meta perks. Now, most killers will only play the ones that are the least fun for survivors to play against (Deathslinger, Spirit, etc.), run meta perks, and consistently tunnel/camp survivors out of the game. In turn, this is forcing more survivors to run meta perks more often to counter, so the game becomes less fun for the killers, too.

The ranks "reset" the 13th of every month, and I have not seen this kind of toxicity at this scale after ANY of the previous rank resets.

So, go ahead and blame the devs for making server desyncs worse. But the playerbase at large needs to look in the mirror and ask themselves which future they want for the game. Do you want to be toxic and run meta perks every single game, or do you want to play in ways that make the game more enjoyable for everyone?

[h1]TL;DR: Fun and exciting game, awful development team.[/h1]

I've put a lot of time into this game both as survivor and killer. I can recommend the gameplay and multiplayer aspects. It's tons of fun with friends! Killer can be a bit stressful because it's 1v4 and the community can be quite toxic.

The main issues I have with the game are the development team at Behaviour Interactive.

A few issues I can think of recently:
[list]
[*]They have ignored longstanding issues with the game in order to focus on microtransactions. 
[*]Changing things that don't need to be fixed.
[*]Introducing new patches that break the game and saying they will fix it in a few months.
[*]Changing useful components to the game to be less intuitive.
[*]Promising to listen to players and then pushing bug filled patches to live servers after being warned. Ignoring all feedback.
[*]Refusing to make a colourblind mode for players. Finally promised to make one after some bad press where they said they didn't care to make one.
[*]The developers don't play the game enough to know what issues are in the game. From interviews it seems none of them play beyond mid-ranks or have experience playing killers. How can you balance an asymmetrical game that you only play one side of?
[*]Breaking hitboxes and hit detection and then saying they will just "fix it later" as if it isn't a major issue.
[/list]

If the dev team step up and take more responsibility I'll change my review but right now, in this state, I cannot recommend Dead by Daylight. The game is fun but right now it is in a bad state that doesn't represent the Dead by Daylight that I sunk all these hours into. I won't be playing this game or giving Behaviour Interactive any more money until these issues are sorted and the game (and dev team) make a recovery.
